name: Lonely Zombie (UnwantedFriedChicken)
description:
You play as a zombie walking in the night alone, you are on the run because adventurer.
Get a new friend by touching them! but becareful with adventurer if your level is less than them they will kill you and don't let them kill your friend either

Gameplay is like snake game, you walk automatic

Control:
Move: Arrow Key
Run: Shift

Hitbox credits : https://github.com/kittykatattack/learningPixi

Credits
VisuStella - Core
